"Koffie": "Did you get a feel for it during that Practice Quest?"
"Phantom feels unusual because it uses familiar weapons, but requires you to fight in a completely different way."
"However, if you learn to use this class, it should prove to be very powerful."
"Phantom is at its best when you adapt your fighting style to the situation."
"Whatever you may encounter, I hope you can use the facilities here to be prepared for it."
